message.body: Have u sched. hair appt w/Hind? I nd to call there now. Shall I book u? Avoid ___ dates/times.
Have I told you today that I live you?
Hey sorry! I was napping. I love you too! I should make an appointment...ill be home until New Years, and then the week before mlk day. If you already called them, I will just book later. Thanks!
When u were little u used to cry for hours after a nap. This may do it, too (see email):
Yeah I heard. A few times worse than waking up from a nap, I think.
